amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out the closure or transfer of the United States Naval Station, Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the closure or transfer of the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jolly amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jolly amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Jolly.
